headline: Should You Continue Holding EPAM Systems (EPAM)?
summary: White Falcon Capital Management, an investment fund manager, released its first-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The fund’s performance for the recent quarter was below expectations, as the gains from gold and silver royalty holdings were unable to cover the losses in some of the larger positions. On […]
